analysis.key_quote: I believe that the majority of actions taken in these past few months are direct violations of the U.S. Constitution which all Civil Services should have taken prior to being employed by any specific Federal Governmental Agency.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses shock and embarrassment regarding the removal of protections for civil servants, indicating a strong opposition to the proposed rule. It also raises constitutional concerns, which align with the themes of merit-based systems and due process.
